??? : 장비를 정지합니다. 정지하겠습니다. 안되잖아? 어.. 정..정지가 안돼 어.. 정지시킬 수가 없어! 안돼!
??? : 미안하지만 고든? 난 지금 밥뻐!
??? : 10분 전에 실험실에 들어갔어야 되는거 아니야?
??? : 제발 실험이 끝날 때까지 방해하지 말아줘!
??? : 지금은 방해하지 말아줘.
이 대사들 계속 반복해서 듣는거 국룰 ㅋㅋㅋ
игра с интересной историей с интересным лором но если играть долго наскучивоет но вроде всем понравилась та что по скидке можно взять

半条命1绝对是游戏史上划时代的作品
WIN10 ，有时会闪退，难度还是有的

In Half-Life we play Gordon Freeman, a theoretical physicist working at Black Mesa who is late for work. After witnessing unexpected events in the experiment that Gordon is part of, he has the mission to go through the Black Mesa facilities and help his colleagues and then teleport to the Xen dimension and end his journey with an unexpected ending. As for the gameplay, the aiming system and the gameplay in general is very good and still very enjoyable. It is true that the graphics are not its strongest section (let's be fair they are from 1998), but they take a back seat when you are immersed in the story that this game has.
on a rail isnt even that bad

Just beat the game as I'm writing this review, gotta say for a game from 1998, It has impressed me, it lives up to today's standards even if the graphics aren't the best, but it does have that classic charm to it. I had a lot of fun overall, the story was quite interesting, and the gameplay wasn't bad really other for a few bugs that occurred, but It was manageable. Definitely must say it was an extremely long game, felt endless at points, but if anything It made for a better story in the end as well as introducing some interesting puzzles. Not really much else to say, but overall I think this is probably one of the best games series of all time. Thanks valve for the dedication to this game over the 24 years its been around.
jogo muito bom, um puco complicado para saber onde que e para ir mas eu ecomendo muito
black ops on hard are way too annoying other than that this game is bloody amazing
самая первая игра в которую я играл
Очень интересная игра, советую всем пройти её!!! :-D

This game has been in my Library for a few years now and I've started it a handful of times. Well, after ordering the Index, I wanted to play through it before digging into Alyx and oh man, this is a great game. The graphics and controls are definitely dated, but there's still a lot of fun to be had for someone who's never experienced this game before. Definitely recommend.
have you ever killed a crab with a high power laser weapon? [b] do you want to? [/b]
Its like the second game but better

Klasyk przez wielkie K! To jak dużo cała branża zawdzięcza tej grze jest wprost niepojęte. Gameplay wciąż jest świetny, muzyka fantastyczna, fabuła interesująca, a świat przedstawiony jest jedyny w swoim rodzaju. W tej grze jest tak dużo innowacyjnych mechanik, że to w prost trzeba zobaczyć, tym bardziej, że niektóre z nich wciąż nie są standardem. Polecam tę grę każdemu bez wyjątku, szczególnie biorąc pod uwagę jak tania ta gra jest.
An amazing yet challenging classic; fans of Doom or Team Fortress will love this!

"No! I'm with the science team!"

This game is the reason I'm playing FPS Games.

Классика жанра. Много раз проходил на пиратке все части half-life, дополнения и эпизоды и только недавно купил на распродаже всю серию half-life и другие игры valve. Если честно, купил бы даже без распродажи.

fkced by steampipe tho
I wish i got black mesa

An all-time classic (of course), and it looks like they've improved the NPC models, which were the weakest part of the original version. Shows its age overall but still holds up as well worth playing. Come for the LONG, immersive adventure; stay for the lovely sound design and level architecture.
harika oyun kalan son düzgün rekabetci oyunu diyebilrim

Half life is a fun game made by Valve it is kind of old but it's still really good and I suggest it to anyone. The graphics are older but it still is graphically appealing! Black Mesa is a remastered version of the game if anyone is interested to try it! I still think this version is the best!
Отличная игра, даже спустя столько времени остаётся шикарной. Финальная битва была отличной!

ok. Juego clásico. Clásico para amanecerte en los 90's o 2000´s. 
Para analizarlo y entender lo que pasó. 
Ahora lo he vuelto a jugar. Pero he encontrado muchos glitchs y algunos errores en jugabilidad. 
Sin embargo. sus 23 horas de juego lo sustentan. 
Es para explorar todo el mapa y ver detalles y ver secretos y entender las tramas. Muy bueno.
It's the first game, in one of the BEST game franchises ever. God-tier.
отличная игра. жаль нет русского языка, хотя бы субтитры. спустя даже столько лет по своему прикольная)

Dude this is probably one of my favorite games of all time. I felt immersed and have been captivated by the story so far. Playing on the hardest difficulty is recomended, you'll die pretty easily and unless you're really good you will never be at 100% health most of the time, but it really adds to the immersion that you're out of your league.

10/10 really felt like gordon freeman. gonna play some more after i finish hw.

Купил игру в наборе Valve Complete Pack, долго думал, смогу ли ее пройти, ибо она же старая.
Проходилось на одном дыхании, сразу же готов был пройти и другие части, но времени не хватило пока на них.
Физика игры потрясная.
Сами локации не пустые, везде что-то обязательно лежит. Не чувствуется, что комнаты пустые.
Вражеские юниты разнообразны, видов оружий очень много.
Единственное, графика устарела очень сильно.
Сюжетная линия на самом деле не так проста, нужен русификатор, чтобы сразу понимать игру.

Итог, цена адекватная по сей день, а на счет покупки надо подумать.
Как я понял, у игры есть ремастер. Если он есть, то смысла покупать нет, а если она есть, но ужасная, то покупать стоит. Вот такие легендарные игры можно проходить, потому что хотя-бы понимаешь их.
